timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't be clearer to use (or create) a new custom dialect for MariaDB instead of using MySQLCustomDialect to decoupling?

replies.bodyText: No, it's not worth it. MariaDB is 100% compatible with mysql and currently we have only scripts for mysql
